member.name: IResultsFolder.AddIDList
member.summary: Inserts a pointer to an item identifier list (PIDL) into a results folder.
member.param: A pointer to the IDList of the given object relative to the Desktop.
A PIDL consisting of 0 or 1 structures, relative to a parent folder. This parameter maybe NULL.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IResultsFolder.AddItem
member.summary: Adds an item to a results folder.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IResultsFolder.RemoveAll
member.summary: Removes all items from a results folder.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IResultsFolder.RemoveIDList
member.summary: Removes a pointer to an item identifier list (PIDL) from a results folder.
member.param: A PIDL relative to the Desktop.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IResultsFolder.RemoveItem
member.summary: Removes an item from a results folder.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Exposes methods that hold items from a data object.
An IResultsFolder is a folder that can hold items from all over the namespace and represent them to the user in a single folder.
